name: Conversations We Have In My Head
name_original: Conversations We Have In My Head
description: Many of us have voices in our heads that constantly remind us of our perceived failures and inadequacies. Sometimes, those voices appear to us in the form of a once-important, now-estranged person from our past. This is a game about having one of those conversations with that voice in your head, in real time, and the many ways it can go.
